content: Choose the format for each file to be downloaded

comment.text: The translation key "ChooseFormatText" is used to display a message prompting users to select the format for files to be downloaded in a download dialog. This text appears as a label within a file selection interface, guiding users through the conversion process.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Yüklənəcək hər bir faylın formatını seçin " is technically correct but sounds slightly unnatural in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would be "Hər bir yüklənəcək faylın formatını seçin". The order of 'hər bir' and 'yüklənəcək' is reversed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hər bir yüklənəcək faylın formatını seçin

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Избери формат за всеки файл, който ще бъде изтеглен' is a literal translation and sounds a bit awkward in Bulgarian. A more natural phrasing would be 'Изберете формат за всеки файл при сваляне' or 'Изберете формат за сваляне на всеки файл'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Изберете формат за сваляне на всеки файл

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Wählen Sie ein Format für das Herunterladen von Dateien aus' is a bit wordy and not the most natural phrasing. 'aus' at the end isn't necessary and makes it less concise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Wählen Sie ein Format für den Download von Dateien.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Elija el formato de cada archivo que desea descargar' is a bit too literal and clunky. While technically correct, it doesn't flow naturally in Spanish. 'Desea descargar' is somewhat formal and implies a choice that might not be necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Elija el formato para cada archivo a descargar

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation 'Ընտրեք յուրաքանչյուր ֆայլի ձևաչափը ներբեռնելու համար։' is a literal translation and might not be the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'Choose the format for each file to be downloaded' in Armenian.  It emphasizes 'for downloading' which isn't as central to the meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ընտրեք ֆայլերի ձևաչափը ներբեռնման համար։ (Entrek fayleri dzevachapn nerbernman hamar.) - Choose the file formats for downloading.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ດາວໂຫລດ' (download) is written with a space in the middle. It should be 'ດາວໂຫຼດ' without the space.

The translation 'Escolha o formato para cada ficheiro a ser transferido' is not the most natural or accurate translation of 'Choose the format for each file to be downloaded'.  'Transferido' implies a process of moving a file from one location to another, whereas 'downloaded' specifically refers to receiving a file from a remote server.  A better translation would convey the receiving action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Escolha o formato para cada arquivo a ser baixado

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Selectați formatul pentru fiecare fișier de încărcat' implies uploading files, while the English text refers to downloading. 'Încărcat' means 'uploaded'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Selectați formatul pentru fiecare fișier de descărcat

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "එක් එක් ගොනුව බාගැනීමට වුවමනා ආකෘතිය තෝරන්න" while understandable, doesn't perfectly capture the nuance of 'Choose the format for each file to be downloaded'. A more literal and accurate translation might better reflect the original meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Perhaps "බාගැනීම සඳහා එක් එක් ගොනුවේ ආකෘතිය තෝරන්න" (Baaganeema sanada ekak ek gonawe aakruththiya thoraanna) - 'Choose the format for each file for download'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Изаберите формат за сваку датотеку коју желите да преузмете' is a bit verbose and could be more concise. While technically correct, it includes 'коју желите да преузмете' which translates to 'which you want to download'. This is redundant as 'download' is implied by 'format'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Изаберите формат сваке датотеке за преузимање

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Choose the format for each file to be downloaded' is not perfectly conveyed by the Turkish translation 'İndirilecek her bir dosyanın türünü seçin'. 'Format' implies a more specific file type (e.g., PDF, DOCX, TXT) rather than just 'type' (tür).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İndirilecek her bir dosyanın dosya türünü seçin
